title: Hologram Theater Adventure #105
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Hologram Control Room
rooms.description: A sleek control room filled with glowing blue panels and holographic displays floating in mid-air. Banks of servers hum softly along the walls. Through a large window, you can see the main projection stage where shimmering holograms flicker. The air smells of ozone and electronics.

items.name: main control console
items.description: A curved console with multiple compartments and holographic interfaces

items.name: hologram technician manual
items.description: A digital manual displayed on a transparent tablet
items.text: HOLOGRAM THEATER MANUAL: System installed in 2047. Chief Technician: Marcus Chen. Lead Programmer: Sarah Vega. Remember: The Reality Core is the heart of all projections. Only authorized personnel may access the stage area.

items.name: blue access keycard
items.description: A keycard with holographic security strips labeled STAGE ACCESS

items.name: server rack
items.description: A tall rack of humming servers with blinking status lights

items.name: maintenance log tablet
items.description: A tablet showing recent system maintenance records
items.text: MAINTENANCE LOG: Reality Core requires three-factor authentication. Security questions updated by Chief Technician Marcus Chen. Core location: Central Processing Chamber behind the main stage.

items.name: technician desk unit
items.description: A workstation desk with drawers and holographic displays

items.name: encrypted data chip
items.description: A small data chip containing encrypted information
items.text: ENCRYPTED MESSAGE: Core access credentials - Username: ADMIN. Password: HOLOGRAM_PRIME. The Reality Core powers all theater projections from the Central Processing Chamber.

items.name: reinforced stage door
items.description: A heavy door with a card reader leading to the projection stage

rooms.name: Holographic Projection Stage
rooms.description: A vast circular stage where multiple holographic projections shimmer and dance. Ancient ruins, alien landscapes, and futuristic cities flicker in and out of existence. Projection emitters line the ceiling and walls. A massive door to the east is labeled REALITY CORE ACCESS with a security terminal beside it.

items.name: hologram emitter array one
items.description: A cluster of projection devices creating a forest scene
items.text: Emitter Label: NATURE SCENE PROJECTOR - Programmed by Sarah Vega. Status: Active.

items.name: hologram emitter array two
items.description: Projection equipment displaying a cityscape
items.text: Emitter Label: URBAN SCENE PROJECTOR - Programmed by Sarah Vega. Status: Active.

items.name: hologram emitter array three
items.description: Devices projecting an underwater scene with swimming fish
items.text: Emitter Label: AQUATIC SCENE PROJECTOR - Programmed by Sarah Vega. Status: Active.

items.name: stage equipment cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet containing various holographic equipment and tools

items.name: projection specifications document
items.description: Technical specifications for the hologram system
items.text: PROJECTION SPECS: All holograms are generated from the Reality Core located in the Central Processing Chamber. Chief Technician Marcus Chen oversees all core operations. Lead Programmer Sarah Vega maintains the software systems.

items.name: holographic calibration device
items.description: A handheld device used for adjusting hologram projections

items.name: stage control pedestal
items.description: A pedestal with holographic controls floating above it

items.name: security protocol memo
items.description: A holographic document outlining security procedures
items.text: SECURITY MEMO: Reality Core access requires authentication. Questions: Who is the Chief Technician? Who programmed the holograms? Where is the Reality Core located? Only authorized personnel may proceed.

items.name: Reality Core access door
items.description: A massive reinforced door with a security terminal displaying three authentication questions

password_questions.question: Who is the Chief Technician?
password_questions.hint: Check the technician manual and maintenance logs

password_questions.question: Who programmed the holograms?
password_questions.hint: Read the labels on the hologram emitters

password_questions.question: Where is the Reality Core located?
password_questions.hint: Multiple documents mention the core location

rooms.name: Reality Core Chamber
rooms.description: You have reached the heart of the Hologram Theater! A massive spherical core of pure light hovers in the center of the chamber, pulsing with energy. Streams of data flow around it like rivers of light. Holographic displays show every projection in the theater. A shimmering exit portal has materialized, leading back to reality.

items.name: Reality Core sphere
items.description: A magnificent sphere of concentrated holographic energy, the source of all theater projections

items.name: core control terminal
items.description: The main terminal for controlling the Reality Core systems
items.text: REALITY CORE STATUS: All systems operational. Theater projections stable. Emergency exit protocol activated. You have successfully accessed the core chamber.

items.name: flowing data streams
items.description: Ribbons of light carrying information between the core and the theater systems

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You have reached the Reality Core at the heart of the Hologram Theater! The core recognizes your presence and activates the emergency exit protocol. A shimmering portal opens before you, leading back to the real world. You step through, leaving the world of holograms behind. You win!
